about_the_game:
Welcome to the futuristic fun of Foosball Runner!

In Foosball Runner, you are not just playing the game; you are the game! Set in the sleek halls of a spaceship, this unique twist on table football puts you in the role of a plump footballer navigating dynamic tables. Dodge spinning figures, collect keys, and race against time to unlock gates and score big.

Gameplay

Experience the excitement of controlling a rotund footballer as you sprint through vibrant, futuristic tables. Your mission: collect five visible keys scattered across the table within one minute. As you dash around, avoid the spinning figures that get faster and hit harder with each level. Unlock the gate with the keys and roll in to score under a minute!

!!! On this demo version of the game, you can play only 3 levels on the first table. !!!

Features

• Unique Character: Play as a loveable, rotund footballer sprinting through action-packed tables.

• Intense Action: Dodge spinning figures, collect keys, and race against the clock to unlock gates.

• Power-Ups: Grab special items to stop spinning figures for 5 seconds or to boost your speed for 7 seconds.

• Two Challenging Tables ( !!! Not available on this demo !!! ): Start on EASY to learn the ropes, then prove your skills on the HARD table, each with 7 levels of difficulty.

• Multiplayer Mode ( !!! Not available on this demo !!! ): Challenge friends and players worldwide in exciting multiplayer matches where the first to score 5 goals wins.

• Futuristic Visuals: Enjoy stunning graphics with tables and interiors that boast a high-tech, futuristic look.

• Replayability: Each time the game offers unique challenges and endless fun, encouraging repeated play.

Visuals and Audio

Foosball Runner features sleek, futuristic graphics that immerse you in a high-tech spaceship environment. The fun, quirky audio includes humorous character dialogues and funny pain sounds when the character gets hit, adding a playful charm to the game. Energetic music keeps the adrenaline pumping as you race against time to collect keys and score.

name: FOOSBALL RUNNER Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Graphics: GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Foosball Runner is a thrilling twist on table football where you are the ball! Navigate futuristic table in a spaceship, dodge spinning figures, collect keys, and unlock gates to score under a minute. Use power-ups to stop figures or boost your speed.
